citations.narrative:
There are 3 open bags of dog food in the entry to the kennel.
All open supplies of food and bedding must be kept in leakproof containers with tightly fitting lids to prevent contamination
and spoilage.
All open bags of dog food must be kept in leakproof containers with tight lids to prevent contamination and deterioration of
the food.
To be corrected by January 31, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.1(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There are 3 open bags of dog food in the entry to the kennel. 
All open supplies of food and bedding must be kept in leakproof containers with tightly fitting lids to prevent contamination 
and spoilage. 
All open bags of dog food must be kept in leakproof containers with tight lids to prevent contamination and deterioration of 
the food. 
To be corrected by January 31, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
